projekt.titel: Ensemble Learning for Anaphora- and Coreference-Resolution-Systems
projekt.autoren: Thomas Boegel, Lukas Funk, Andreas Kull
projekt.abstract: ELAC's core functionality is to utilize several Anaphora- and Coreference-Resolution-Systems (ACRS) in order to use their predictions for training an ensemble of (meta-)machine-learning algorithms. This ensemble classifies the ACRS predictions on a test corpus as either trustworthy or untrustworthy and tries to achieve a better recall/precision than a single ACRS. There are several non-core functionalities as well: 1. A tool which extracts the feature distribution in a corpus. 2. A parser which transforms Salsa/Tiger format to an inline notation which can be processed by MMAX2. 3. An ablation testing tool which determines the best feature sequence.
